service.name: FREE WiFi
service.description: Connect to fast, FREE, easy-to-use O2 WiFi throughout the store.

service.name: Restaurant
service.description: Enjoy a delicious great British breakfast, succulent roast carvery meat, sensational salads, indulgent treats and a great selection of children's food.

service.name: Personal Shopper
service.description:
Need help finding the perfect outfit? Debenhams Personal shoppers offer expert help and advice with all your shopping and the service is completely FREE.
Find out more or Book a FREE appointment online

service.name: Bra Fit Service
service.description: Did you know that 80% of women are wearing the wrong size bra? Visit one of our specially trained bra fit advisers for a FREE bra fit consultation. They’ll give you as much time as you need until you find just the right size, shape and style to suit.

service.name: Wedding Service
service.description: Debenhams Wedding Service guides you through every aspect of planning your wedding. Whether it’s choosing your perfect wedding dress, hiring the groom's outfit or selecting Personalised Wedding Stationery. Find out more

service.name: In store ordering service
service.description: Can't find your size, colour, or the item you are looking for? We have the solution: visit our in store ordering service and we'll order the item you are looking for and deliver it direct to your home or a work address.

service.name: Carry to Car
service.description: Too much to carry? Let us help you to your car. Ask in store and one of our staff will assist you with your items direct to your car. Health and safety restrictions apply. For more information on this free service please ask in store for details, or call our Customer Service team on 0344 800 8877.

service.name: Collect by Car
service.description: In selected stores we can hold your item in a dedicated parking bay or pick-up point ready for collection by car. For more information on this free service please ask in store for details, or call our Customer Service team on 0344 800 8877

service.name: Parent and Baby room
service.description: Debenhams welcomes even the youngest of customers so we have a parent and baby room located next to the toilets. The room is private and clean so whether it’s nappy changing or breastfeeding you can cater to your baby’s needs in a comfortable environment.

service.name: Disabled access
service.description: Debenhams aims to provide exceptional service to all of our customers. We offer a number of facilities including designated parking spaces; accessible entrances; accessible customer collection points; passenger lift facilities; accessible restaurant facilities; accessible toilets; personal shopper facilities; collect by and carry to car arrangements; delivery of purchases to your home and Induction loops and / or arrangements for confidential conversation.

service.name: Clarins Skin Spa
service.description: Indulge the senses with a range of Clarins Skin Spa Treatment vouchers exclusive to Debenhams. Available in store and online each treatment is specially designed to refresh, revitalize and re-energize your face and body.

service.name: Travel Money
service.description: Going away on holiday? Debenhams offer you currency rates that are hard to beat and 0% commission on your Travel Money. Simply visit our Travel Money Bureau in store. Please be aware that some of our Travel Money Bureaus may open later and close earlier than the store. For further information please call the bureau.

service.description: Connect to fast, FREE, easy-to-use O2 WiFi throughout the store.

service.name: In Time Watch Repairs
service.description:
For watch repairs, new batteries and a large selection of replacement straps visit the watch experts.


Watch repairs
  • - Servicing & overhauls
  • - Quartz module exchanges
  • - Crown & stem replacement
  • - Glass replacement
  • - Dial restoration
  • - Minor repairs

Straps & bracelets
  • - Leather, polyurethane & sports straps
  • - Stainless steel & gold plated bracelets
  • - Manufacturers straps & bracelets
  • - Bracelet alterations & repair

Watch batteries
  • - Battery replacements to all brands
  • - 18 month guarantee

Pressure testing
  • - Gasket replacements
  • - On-site water resistance testing

service.name: FREE WiFi
service.description: Connect to fast, FREE, easy-to-use O2 WiFi throughout the store.

service.name: Restaurant
service.description: Enjoy a delicious great British breakfast, succulent roast carvery meat, sensational salads, indulgent treats and a great selection of children's food.

service.name: Brow Bar
service.description: Keep your brows perfectly groomed and shaped by visiting the Benefit Brow Bar for waxing or the Benito Brow Bar for threading.

service.name: Personal Shopper
service.description:
Need help finding the perfect outfit? Debenhams Personal shoppers offer expert help and advice with all your shopping and the service is completely FREE.
Find out more or Book a FREE appointment online

service.name: Bra Fit Service
service.description: Did you know that 80% of women are wearing the wrong size bra? Visit one of our specially trained bra fit advisers for a FREE bra fit consultation. They’ll give you as much time as you need until you find just the right size, shape and style to suit.

service.name: Wedding Service
service.description: Debenhams Wedding Service guides you through every aspect of planning your wedding. Whether it’s choosing your perfect wedding dress, hiring the groom's outfit or selecting Personalised Wedding Stationery. Find out more

service.name: In store ordering service
service.description: Can't find your size, colour, or the item you are looking for? We have the solution: visit our in store ordering service and we'll order the item you are looking for and deliver it direct to your home or a work address.

service.name: Carry to Car
service.description: Too much to carry? Let us help you to your car. Ask in store and one of our staff will assist you with your items direct to your car. Health and safety restrictions apply. For more information on this free service please ask in store for details, or call our Customer Service team on 0344 800 8877.

service.name: Collect by Car
service.description: In selected stores we can hold your item in a dedicated parking bay or pick-up point ready for collection by car. For more information on this free service please ask in store for details, or call our Customer Service team on 0344 800 8877

service.name: Parent and Baby room
service.description: Debenhams welcomes even the youngest of customers so we have a parent and baby room located next to the toilets. The room is private and clean so whether it’s nappy changing or breastfeeding you can cater to your baby’s needs in a comfortable environment.

service.name: Disabled access
service.description: Debenhams aims to provide exceptional service to all of our customers. We offer a number of facilities including designated parking spaces; accessible entrances; accessible customer collection points; passenger lift facilities; accessible restaurant facilities; accessible toilets; personal shopper facilities; collect by and carry to car arrangements; delivery of purchases to your home and Induction loops and / or arrangements for confidential conversation.

service.name: Travel Money
service.description: Going away on holiday? Debenhams offer you currency rates that are hard to beat and 0% commission on your Travel Money. Simply visit our Travel Money Bureau in store. Please be aware that some of our Travel Money Bureaus may open later and close earlier than the store. For further information please call the bureau.

service.description: Did you know that 80% of women are wearing the wrong size bra? Visit one of our specially trained bra fit advisers for a FREE bra fit consultation. They’ll give you as much time as you need until you find just the right size, shape and style to suit.

service.name: In store ordering service
service.description: Can't find your size, colour, or the item you are looking for? We have the solution: visit our in store ordering service and we'll order the item you are looking for and deliver it direct to your home or a work address.

service.name: Carry to Car
service.description: Too much to carry? Let us help you to your car. Ask in store and one of our staff will assist you with your items direct to your car. Health and safety restrictions apply. For more information on this free service please ask in store for details, or call our Customer Service team on 0344 800 8877.

service.name: Collect by Car
service.description: In selected stores we can hold your item in a dedicated parking bay or pick-up point ready for collection by car. For more information on this free service please ask in store for details, or call our Customer Service team on 0344 800 8877

service.name: Parent and Baby room
service.description: Debenhams welcomes even the youngest of customers so we have a parent and baby room located next to the toilets. The room is private and clean so whether it’s nappy changing or breastfeeding you can cater to your baby’s needs in a comfortable environment.

service.name: Disabled access
service.description: Debenhams aims to provide exceptional service to all of our customers. We offer a number of facilities including designated parking spaces; accessible entrances; accessible customer collection points; passenger lift facilities; accessible restaurant facilities; accessible toilets; personal shopper facilities; collect by and carry to car arrangements; delivery of purchases to your home and Induction loops and / or arrangements for confidential conversation.

service.name: Travel Money
service.description: Going away on holiday? Debenhams offer you currency rates that are hard to beat and 0% commission on your Travel Money. Simply visit our Travel Money Bureau in store. Please be aware that some of our Travel Money Bureaus may open later and close earlier than the store. For further information please call the bureau.

We offer a number of facilities including designated parking spaces; accessible entrances; accessible customer collection points; passenger lift facilities; accessible restaurant facilities; accessible toilets; personal shopper facilities; collect by and carry to car arrangements; delivery of purchases to your home and Induction loops and / or arrangements for confidential conversation.

service.name: Travel Money
service.description: Going away on holiday? Debenhams offer you currency rates that are hard to beat and 0% commission on your Travel Money. Simply visit our Travel Money Bureau in store. Please be aware that some of our Travel Money Bureaus may open later and close earlier than the store. For further information please call the bureau.

service.name: FREE WiFi
service.description: Connect to fast, FREE, easy-to-use O2 WiFi throughout the store.

service.name: Brow Bar
service.description: Keep your brows perfectly groomed and shaped by visiting the Benefit Brow Bar for waxing or the Benito Brow Bar for threading.

service.name: Café
service.description: The perfect place to stop for a freshly ground coffee or to enjoy a delicious range of hot and cold sandwiches, sensational salads, soup, freshly baked scones and indulgent cakes.

service.name: Bra Fit Service
service.description: Did you know that 80% of women are wearing the wrong size bra? Visit one of our specially trained bra fit advisers for a FREE bra fit consultation. They’ll give you as much time as you need until you find just the right size, shape and style to suit.

service.name: In store ordering service
service.description: Can't find your size, colour, or the item you are looking for? We have the solution: visit our in store ordering service and we'll order the item you are looking for and deliver it direct to your home or a work address.

service.name: Parent and Baby room
service.description: Debenhams welcomes even the youngest of customers so we have a parent and baby room located next to the toilets. The room is private and clean so whether it’s nappy changing or breastfeeding you can cater to your baby’s needs in a comfortable environment.

service.name: In Time Watch Repairs
service.description:
For watch repairs, new batteries and a large selection of replacement straps visit the watch experts.


Watch repairs
  • - Servicing & overhauls
  • - Quartz module exchanges
  • - Crown & stem replacement
  • - Glass replacement
  • - Dial restoration
  • - Minor repairs

Straps & bracelets
  • - Leather, polyurethane & sports straps
  • - Stainless steel & gold plated bracelets
  • - Manufacturers straps & bracelets
  • - Bracelet alterations & repair

Watch batteries
  • - Battery replacements to all brands
  • - 18 month guarantee

Pressure testing
  • - Gasket replacements
  • - On-site water resistance testing

service.name: Personal Shopper
service.description:
Need help finding the perfect outfit? Debenhams Personal shoppers offer expert help and advice with all your shopping and the service is completely FREE.
Find out more or Book a FREE appointment online

service.name: Wedding Service
service.description: Debenhams Wedding Service guides you through every aspect of planning your wedding. Whether it’s choosing your perfect wedding dress, hiring the groom's outfit or selecting Personalised Wedding Stationery. Find out more

service.name: In store ordering service
service.description: Can't find your size, colour, or the item you are looking for? We have the solution: visit our in store ordering service and we'll order the item you are looking for and deliver it direct to your home or a work address.

service.name: Parent and Baby room
service.description: Debenhams welcomes even the youngest of customers so we have a parent and baby room located next to the toilets. The room is private and clean so whether it’s nappy changing or breastfeeding you can cater to your baby’s needs in a comfortable environment.

service.name: Disabled access
service.description: Debenhams aims to provide exceptional service to all of our customers. We offer a number of facilities including designated parking spaces; accessible entrances; accessible customer collection points; passenger lift facilities; accessible restaurant facilities; accessible toilets; personal shopper facilities; collect by and carry to car arrangements; delivery of purchases to your home and Induction loops and / or arrangements for confidential conversation.

service.name: Clarins Skin Spa
service.description: Indulge the senses with a range of Clarins Skin Spa Treatment vouchers exclusive to Debenhams. Available in store and online each treatment is specially designed to refresh, revitalize and re-energize your face and body.

service.name: Travel Money
service.description: Going away on holiday? Debenhams offer you currency rates that are hard to beat and 0% commission on your Travel Money. Simply visit our Travel Money Bureau in store. Please be aware that some of our Travel Money Bureaus may open later and close earlier than the store. For further information please call the bureau.

service.name: In Time Watch Repairs
service.description:
For watch repairs, new batteries and a large selection of replacement straps visit the watch experts.


Watch repairs
  • - Servicing & overhauls
  • - Quartz module exchanges
  • - Crown & stem replacement
  • - Glass replacement
  • - Dial restoration
  • - Minor repairs

Straps & bracelets
  • - Leather, polyurethane & sports straps
  • - Stainless steel & gold plated bracelets
  • - Manufacturers straps & bracelets
  • - Bracelet alterations & repair

Watch batteries
  • - Battery replacements to all brands
  • - 18 month guarantee

Pressure testing
  • - Gasket replacements
  • - On-site water resistance testing

We offer a number of facilities including designated parking spaces; accessible entrances; accessible customer collection points; passenger lift facilities; accessible restaurant facilities; accessible toilets; personal shopper facilities; collect by and carry to car arrangements; delivery of purchases to your home and Induction loops and / or arrangements for confidential conversation.

service.name: FREE WiFi
service.description: Connect to fast, FREE, easy-to-use O2 WiFi throughout the store.

service.name: Restaurant
service.description: Enjoy a delicious great British breakfast, succulent roast carvery meat, sensational salads, indulgent treats and a great selection of children's food.

service.name: Beauty Rooms
service.description: Treat yourself to a well-deserved facial, body wax or massage in our beauty rooms. Here we have everything you need for your total well-being.

service.name: Costa
service.description: Experience the perfectly handcrafted cup of coffee by the nation's favourite coffee shop on the go or in store (Source: in an independent survey of 2110 people published in December 2015 by Allegra Strategies, 48% voted Costa their favourite coffee shop).

service.name: Personal Shopper
service.description:
Need help finding the perfect outfit? Debenhams Personal shoppers offer expert help and advice with all your shopping and the service is completely FREE.
Find out more or Book a FREE appointment online

service.name: Bra Fit Service
service.description: Did you know that 80% of women are wearing the wrong size bra? Visit one of our specially trained bra fit advisers for a FREE bra fit consultation. They’ll give you as much time as you need until you find just the right size, shape and style to suit.

service.name: Wedding Service
service.description: Debenhams Wedding Service guides you through every aspect of planning your wedding. Whether it’s choosing your perfect wedding dress, hiring the groom's outfit or selecting Personalised Wedding Stationery. Find out more

service.name: In store ordering service
service.description: Can't find your size, colour, or the item you are looking for? We have the solution: visit our in store ordering service and we'll order the item you are looking for and deliver it direct to your home or a work address.

service.name: Carry to Car
service.description: Too much to carry? Let us help you to your car. Ask in store and one of our staff will assist you with your items direct to your car. Health and safety restrictions apply. For more information on this free service please ask in store for details, or call our Customer Service team on 0344 800 8877.

service.name: Gold Card Lounge and lockers
service.description: As a Debenhams Gold Cardholder you can take a break from shopping and relax in our comfortable lounges, and use our secure lockers to store your bags while you shop. This exclusive service is available in selected stores only.

service.name: Parent and Baby room
service.description: Debenhams welcomes even the youngest of customers so we have a parent and baby room located next to the toilets. The room is private and clean so whether it’s nappy changing or breastfeeding you can cater to your baby’s needs in a comfortable environment.

service.name: Disabled access
service.description: Debenhams aims to provide exceptional service to all of our customers. We offer a number of facilities including designated parking spaces; accessible entrances; accessible customer collection points; passenger lift facilities; accessible restaurant facilities; accessible toilets; personal shopper facilities; collect by and carry to car arrangements; delivery of purchases to your home and Induction loops and / or arrangements for confidential conversation.

service.name: Clarins Skin Spa
service.description: Indulge the senses with a range of Clarins Skin Spa Treatment vouchers exclusive to Debenhams. Available in store and online each treatment is specially designed to refresh, revitalize and re-energize your face and body.

service.name: Travel Money
service.description: Going away on holiday? Debenhams offer you currency rates that are hard to beat and 0% commission on your Travel Money. Simply visit our Travel Money Bureau in store. Please be aware that some of our Travel Money Bureaus may open later and close earlier than the store. For further information please call the bureau.

service.name: FREE WiFi
service.description: Connect to fast, FREE, easy-to-use O2 WiFi throughout the store.

service.name: In Time Watch Repairs
service.description:
For watch repairs, new batteries and a large selection of replacement straps visit the watch experts.


Watch repairs
  • - Servicing & overhauls
  • - Quartz module exchanges
  • - Crown & stem replacement
  • - Glass replacement
  • - Dial restoration
  • - Minor repairs

Straps & bracelets
  • - Leather, polyurethane & sports straps
  • - Stainless steel & gold plated bracelets
  • - Manufacturers straps & bracelets
  • - Bracelet alterations & repair

Watch batteries
  • - Battery replacements to all brands
  • - 18 month guarantee

Pressure testing
  • - Gasket replacements
  • - On-site water resistance testing

service.name: FREE WiFi
service.description: Connect to fast, FREE, easy-to-use O2 WiFi throughout the store.

service.name: Restaurant
service.description: Enjoy a delicious great British breakfast, succulent roast carvery meat, sensational salads, indulgent treats and a great selection of children's food.

service.name: Personal Shopper
service.description:
Need help finding the perfect outfit? Debenhams Personal shoppers offer expert help and advice with all your shopping and the service is completely FREE.
Find out more or Book a FREE appointment online

service.name: Bra Fit Service
service.description: Did you know that 80% of women are wearing the wrong size bra? Visit one of our specially trained bra fit advisers for a FREE bra fit consultation. They’ll give you as much time as you need until you find just the right size, shape and style to suit.

service.name: Wedding Service
service.description: Debenhams Wedding Service guides you through every aspect of planning your wedding. Whether it’s choosing your perfect wedding dress, hiring the groom's outfit or selecting Personalised Wedding Stationery. Find out more

service.name: In store ordering service
service.description: Can't find your size, colour, or the item you are looking for? We have the solution: visit our in store ordering service and we'll order the item you are looking for and deliver it direct to your home or a work address.

service.name: Carry to Car
service.description: Too much to carry? Let us help you to your car. Ask in store and one of our staff will assist you with your items direct to your car. Health and safety restrictions apply. For more information on this free service please ask in store for details, or call our Customer Service team on 0344 800 8877.

service.name: Collect by Car
service.description: In selected stores we can hold your item in a dedicated parking bay or pick-up point ready for collection by car. For more information on this free service please ask in store for details, or call our Customer Service team on 0344 800 8877

service.name: Parent and Baby room
service.description: Debenhams welcomes even the youngest of customers so we have a parent and baby room located next to the toilets. The room is private and clean so whether it’s nappy changing or breastfeeding you can cater to your baby’s needs in a comfortable environment.

service.name: Disabled access
service.description: Debenhams aims to provide exceptional service to all of our customers. We offer a number of facilities including designated parking spaces; accessible entrances; accessible customer collection points; passenger lift facilities; accessible restaurant facilities; accessible toilets; personal shopper facilities; collect by and carry to car arrangements; delivery of purchases to your home and Induction loops and / or arrangements for confidential conversation.

service.name: Travel Money
service.description: Going away on holiday? Debenhams offer you currency rates that are hard to beat and 0% commission on your Travel Money. Simply visit our Travel Money Bureau in store. Please be aware that some of our Travel Money Bureaus may open later and close earlier than the store. For further information please call the bureau.

service.name: In Time Watch Repairs
service.description:
For watch repairs, new batteries and a large selection of replacement straps visit the watch experts.


Watch repairs
  • - Servicing & overhauls
  • - Quartz module exchanges
  • - Crown & stem replacement
  • - Glass replacement
  • - Dial restoration
  • - Minor repairs

Straps & bracelets
  • - Leather, polyurethane & sports straps
  • - Stainless steel & gold plated bracelets
  • - Manufacturers straps & bracelets
  • - Bracelet alterations & repair

Watch batteries
  • - Battery replacements to all brands
  • - 18 month guarantee

Pressure testing
  • - Gasket replacements
  • - On-site water resistance testing

service.name: Parent and Baby room
service.description: Debenhams welcomes even the youngest of customers so we have a parent and baby room located next to the toilets. The room is private and clean so whether it’s nappy changing or breastfeeding you can cater to your baby’s needs in a comfortable environment.

service.name: Disabled access
service.description: Debenhams aims to provide exceptional service to all of our customers. We offer a number of facilities including designated parking spaces; accessible entrances; accessible customer collection points; passenger lift facilities; accessible restaurant facilities; accessible toilets; personal shopper facilities; collect by and carry to car arrangements; delivery of purchases to your home and Induction loops and / or arrangements for confidential conversation.

service.description: Connect to fast, FREE, easy-to-use O2 WiFi throughout the store.

service.name: In Time Watch Repairs
service.description:
For watch repairs, new batteries and a large selection of replacement straps visit the watch experts.


Watch repairs
  • - Servicing & overhauls
  • - Quartz module exchanges
  • - Crown & stem replacement
  • - Glass replacement
  • - Dial restoration
  • - Minor repairs

Straps & bracelets
  • - Leather, polyurethane & sports straps
  • - Stainless steel & gold plated bracelets
  • - Manufacturers straps & bracelets
  • - Bracelet alterations & repair

Watch batteries
  • - Battery replacements to all brands
  • - 18 month guarantee

Pressure testing
  • - Gasket replacements
  • - On-site water resistance testing

service.name: Joe & The Juice
service.description: Coffee, juice and much more!

service.name: In Time Watch Repairs
service.description:
For watch repairs, new batteries and a large selection of replacement straps visit the watch experts.


Watch repairs
  • - Servicing & overhauls
  • - Quartz module exchanges
  • - Crown & stem replacement
  • - Glass replacement
  • - Dial restoration
  • - Minor repairs

Straps & bracelets
  • - Leather, polyurethane & sports straps
  • - Stainless steel & gold plated bracelets
  • - Manufacturers straps & bracelets
  • - Bracelet alterations & repair

Watch batteries
  • - Battery replacements to all brands
  • - 18 month guarantee

Pressure testing
  • - Gasket replacements
  • - On-site water resistance testing

service.description: Too much to carry? Let us help you to your car. Ask in store and one of our staff will assist you with your items direct to your car. Health and safety restrictions apply. For more information on this free service please ask in store for details, or call our Customer Service team on 0344 800 8877.

service.name: Collect by Car
service.description: In selected stores we can hold your item in a dedicated parking bay or pick-up point ready for collection by car. For more information on this free service please ask in store for details, or call our Customer Service team on 0344 800 8877

service.name: Parent and Baby room
service.description: Debenhams welcomes even the youngest of customers so we have a parent and baby room located next to the toilets. The room is private and clean so whether it’s nappy changing or breastfeeding you can cater to your baby’s needs in a comfortable environment.

service.name: Disabled access
service.description: Debenhams aims to provide exceptional service to all of our customers. We offer a number of facilities including designated parking spaces; accessible entrances; accessible customer collection points; passenger lift facilities; accessible restaurant facilities; accessible toilets; personal shopper facilities; collect by and carry to car arrangements; delivery of purchases to your home and Induction loops and / or arrangements for confidential conversation.

service.name: Clarins Skin Spa
service.description: Indulge the senses with a range of Clarins Skin Spa Treatment vouchers exclusive to Debenhams. Available in store and online each treatment is specially designed to refresh, revitalize and re-energize your face and body.

service.name: Travel Money
service.description: Going away on holiday? Debenhams offer you currency rates that are hard to beat and 0% commission on your Travel Money. Simply visit our Travel Money Bureau in store. Please be aware that some of our Travel Money Bureaus may open later and close earlier than the store. For further information please call the bureau.

service.name: In Time Watch Repairs
service.description:
For watch repairs, new batteries and a large selection of replacement straps visit the watch experts.


Watch repairs
  • - Servicing & overhauls
  • - Quartz module exchanges
  • - Crown & stem replacement
  • - Glass replacement
  • - Dial restoration
  • - Minor repairs

Straps & bracelets
  • - Leather, polyurethane & sports straps
  • - Stainless steel & gold plated bracelets
  • - Manufacturers straps & bracelets
  • - Bracelet alterations & repair

Watch batteries
  • - Battery replacements to all brands
  • - 18 month guarantee

Pressure testing
  • - Gasket replacements
  • - On-site water resistance testing

service.name: James Martin Kitchen
service.description: With its roots firmly in the farms of Britain, James Martin Kitchen is a premium bakery that offers an exciting combination of fresh farm ingredients and the highest quality baking. Every ingredient used is sourced as fresh and locally as possible, highlighting the best of what Britain has to offer in an attractive deli setting. At breakfast time there are a range of hot and cold breakfast sandwiches, fruit and yogurt pots and enticing pastries. Our coffee is James’ own blend, aptly named Kickstart. Moving through the day, our freshly made pies, wraps, sandwiches, baguettes and salads make a perfect lunch. A delicious range of home-made cakes and biscuits made to James’ famous recipes can never fail to appeal. This attention to detail sets us apart and keeps our customers coming back for more. It’s Proper British Food!

service.name: Bra Fit Service
service.description: Did you know that 80% of women are wearing the wrong size bra? Visit one of our specially trained bra fit advisers for a FREE bra fit consultation. They’ll give you as much time as you need until you find just the right size, shape and style to suit.

service.name: In store ordering service
service.description: Can't find your size, colour, or the item you are looking for? We have the solution: visit our in store ordering service and we'll order the item you are looking for and deliver it direct to your home or a work address.

service.name: Carry to Car
service.description: Too much to carry? Let us help you to your car. Ask in store and one of our staff will assist you with your items direct to your car. Health and safety restrictions apply. For more information on this free service please ask in store for details, or call our Customer Service team on 0344 800 8877.

service.name: Parent and Baby room
service.description: Debenhams welcomes even the youngest of customers so we have a parent and baby room located next to the toilets. The room is private and clean so whether it’s nappy changing or breastfeeding you can cater to your baby’s needs in a comfortable environment.

service.name: Disabled access
service.description: Debenhams aims to provide exceptional service to all of our customers. service.name: Joe & The Juice
service.description: Coffee, juice and much more!

service.name: In Time Watch Repairs
service.description:
For watch repairs, new batteries and a large selection of replacement straps visit the watch experts.


Watch repairs
  • - Servicing & overhauls
  • - Quartz module exchanges
  • - Crown & stem replacement
  • - Glass replacement
  • - Dial restoration
  • - Minor repairs

Straps & bracelets
  • - Leather, polyurethane & sports straps
  • - Stainless steel & gold plated bracelets
  • - Manufacturers straps & bracelets
  • - Bracelet alterations & repair

Watch batteries
  • - Battery replacements to all brands
  • - 18 month guarantee

Pressure testing
  • - Gasket replacements
  • - On-site water resistance testing

service.description:
Need help finding the perfect outfit? Debenhams Personal shoppers offer expert help and advice with all your shopping and the service is completely FREE.
Find out more or Book a FREE appointment online

service.name: Bra Fit Service
service.description: Did you know that 80% of women are wearing the wrong size bra? Visit one of our specially trained bra fit advisers for a FREE bra fit consultation. They’ll give you as much time as you need until you find just the right size, shape and style to suit.

service.name: Wedding Service
service.description: Debenhams Wedding Service guides you through every aspect of planning your wedding. Whether it’s choosing your perfect wedding dress, hiring the groom's outfit or selecting Personalised Wedding Stationery. Find out more

service.name: In store ordering service
service.description: Can't find your size, colour, or the item you are looking for? We have the solution: visit our in store ordering service and we'll order the item you are looking for and deliver it direct to your home or a work address.

service.name: Carry to Car
service.description: Too much to carry? Let us help you to your car. Ask in store and one of our staff will assist you with your items direct to your car. Health and safety restrictions apply. For more information on this free service please ask in store for details, or call our Customer Service team on 0344 800 8877.

service.name: Collect by Car
service.description: In selected stores we can hold your item in a dedicated parking bay or pick-up point ready for collection by car. For more information on this free service please ask in store for details, or call our Customer Service team on 0344 800 8877

service.name: Gold Card Lounge and lockers
service.description: As a Debenhams Gold Cardholder you can take a break from shopping and relax in our comfortable lounges, and use our secure lockers to store your bags while you shop. This exclusive service is available in selected stores only.

service.name: Parent and Baby room
service.description: Debenhams welcomes even the youngest of customers so we have a parent and baby room located next to the toilets. The room is private and clean so whether it’s nappy changing or breastfeeding you can cater to your baby’s needs in a comfortable environment.

service.name: Disabled access
service.description: Debenhams aims to provide exceptional service to all of our customers. We offer a number of facilities including designated parking spaces; accessible entrances; accessible customer collection points; passenger lift facilities; accessible restaurant facilities; accessible toilets; personal shopper facilities; collect by and carry to car arrangements; delivery of purchases to your home and Induction loops and / or arrangements for confidential conversation.

service.name: Clarins Skin Spa
service.description: Indulge the senses with a range of Clarins Skin Spa Treatment vouchers exclusive to Debenhams. Available in store and online each treatment is specially designed to refresh, revitalize and re-energize your face and body.

service.name: Travel Money
service.description: Going away on holiday? Debenhams offer you currency rates that are hard to beat and 0% commission on your Travel Money. Simply visit our Travel Money Bureau in store. Please be aware that some of our Travel Money Bureaus may open later and close earlier than the store. For further information please call the bureau.

service.name: In Time Watch Repairs

Watch repairs
  • - Servicing & overhauls
  • - Quartz module exchanges
  • - Crown & stem replacement
  • - Glass replacement
  • - Dial restoration

Straps & bracelets

Watch batteries

  • - 18 month guarantee

Pressure testing
  • - Gasket replacements
  • - On-site water resistance testing

service.name: In store ordering service
service.description: Can't find your size, colour, or the item you are looking for? We have the solution: visit our in store ordering service and we'll order the item you are looking for and deliver it direct to your home or a work address.

service.name: Carry to Car
service.description: Too much to carry? Let us help you to your car. Ask in store and one of our staff will assist you with your items direct to your car. Health and safety restrictions apply. service.name: Collect by Car
service.description: In selected stores we can hold your item in a dedicated parking bay or pick-up point ready for collection by car. For more information on this free service please ask in store for details, or call our Customer Service team on 0344 800 8877

service.name: Parent and Baby room
service.description: Debenhams welcomes even the youngest of customers so we have a parent and baby room located next to the toilets. The room is private and clean so whether it’s nappy changing or breastfeeding you can cater to your baby’s needs in a comfortable environment.

service.name: Disabled access
service.description: Debenhams aims to provide exceptional service to all of our customers. We offer a number of facilities including designated parking spaces; accessible entrances; accessible customer collection points; passenger lift facilities; accessible restaurant facilities; accessible toilets; personal shopper facilities; collect by and carry to car arrangements; delivery of purchases to your home and Induction loops and / or arrangements for confidential conversation.

Need help finding the perfect outfit? Debenhams Personal shoppers offer expert help and advice with all your shopping and the service is completely FREE.
Find out more or Book a FREE appointment online

service.name: Bra Fit Service
service.description: Did you know that 80% of women are wearing the wrong size bra? Visit one of our specially trained bra fit advisers for a FREE bra fit consultation. They’ll give you as much time as you need until you find just the right size, shape and style to suit.

service.name: Wedding Service
service.description: Debenhams Wedding Service guides you through every aspect of planning your wedding. Whether it’s choosing your perfect wedding dress, hiring the groom's outfit or selecting Personalised Wedding Stationery. Find out more

service.name: In store ordering service
service.description: Can't find your size, colour, or the item you are looking for? We have the solution: visit our in store ordering service and we'll order the item you are looking for and deliver it direct to your home or a work address.

service.name: Carry to Car
service.description: Too much to carry? Let us help you to your car. Ask in store and one of our staff will assist you with your items direct to your car. Health and safety restrictions apply. For more information on this free service please ask in store for details, or call our Customer Service team on 0344 800 8877.

service.name: Parent and Baby room
service.description: Debenhams welcomes even the youngest of customers so we have a parent and baby room located next to the toilets. The room is private and clean so whether it’s nappy changing or breastfeeding you can cater to your baby’s needs in a comfortable environment.

service.name: Disabled access
service.description: Debenhams aims to provide exceptional service to all of our customers. We offer a number of facilities including designated parking spaces; accessible entrances; accessible customer collection points; passenger lift facilities; accessible restaurant facilities; accessible toilets; personal shopper facilities; collect by and carry to car arrangements; delivery of purchases to your home and Induction loops and / or arrangements for confidential conversation.

service.name: Clarins Skin Spa
service.description: Indulge the senses with a range of Clarins Skin Spa Treatment vouchers exclusive to Debenhams. Available in store and online each treatment is specially designed to refresh, revitalize and re-energize your face and body.
